mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Zachary Taylor to Mrs. E[leanor] P[arke Custis] Lewis, 1849 July 2
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Taylor, Zachary, 1784-1850
mdRecord.dcterms:description: President Zachary Taylor writes from Washington, D. C. to Eleanor Parke Custis Lewis in George Town, D. C. to say he received her letters by her grandson, Edward Butler--congrat. on daughter [Parke's] "eminent" arrival--will be glad to receive her and family on Tuesday, their day for receiving company--forwards some autographs, as requested. Autograph letter signed, 1 pages with envelope. Collection of autographs.
